resources.string: 1. Kevin, Joseph, and Nicholas are 3 brothers. If the following statements are all true, which of them is the youngest? \n

Kevin is the oldest.
Nicholas is not the oldest.
Joseph is not the youngest.
2. Merlin realizes that all Alakazams are Open Sesames, and some Hocus Pocuses are Alakazams.\nIs it true that some Hocus Pocuses are Open Sesames?\n
Note: There is at least one of each item.\n

3. One of the women bellow is named Kaylee and the other is named Inara. They each make a statement as shown; if we know that at least one of them is a lie, what is the color of the shirt that Inara is wearing? And who is the liar?\n
Note: This is a multiple choice question. Chose two\n
Both Kaylee and Inara are lying

4. There is exactly 1 false statement in this list.
There are exactly 2 false statements in this list.
There are exactly 3 false statements in this list.
Exactly how many false statements are there in the list above?\n
